logicalModel.name: Logical Model
logicalModel.description: A logical model is a expression of a set of content in a FHIR ready style that helps implementers understand the data structure.

codeSystem.name: Code System
codeSystem.description: The CodeSystem resource is used to declare the existence of and describe a code system or code system supplement and its key properties, and optionally define a part or all of its content.

extensibility.name: Extensibility
extensibility.description: Extensibility is a fundamental part of the design of this specification. Every element in a resource can have extension child elements to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource.

valueSet.name: Value set
valueSet.description: Value sets contain specific sets of codes for a given purpose. ValueSets use the codes in Code System.

questionnaire.name: Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: A Questionnaire is an organized collection of questions intended to solicit information from patients, providers or other individuals involved in the healthcare domain.

examples.name: Example: Example Instances
examples.description: Example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like.
